description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Vietnamese Confeds - peace agreements to Vietnam. 2. Pasteur Institute - celebrates 150 years since the medical researcher, Pasteur's birth. 3. The French Academy welcomes an American - author Julien Green, born in Paris at the turn of the 20th century and in 1919 immigrated to his mother's homeland, the USA. 4. The arts: Visionaries of 1900 Intimists - explores the painting and sculptures of various Intimist artists. Intimism was a minority, little known art movement from around 1900. Five centures of imagery - an exhibition at the Museum of Popular Arts and Traditions.
